Class BezierRouter

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Routing
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Simple bezier router that creates smooth curves between ports. Does not perform obstacle avoidance - for that, use SmartBezierRouter.

public class BezierRouter : IEdgeRouter
Inheritance
object
BezierRouter
Implements
IEdgeRouter

object.ToString()

Remarks

This router creates direction-aware bezier curves:

  • Left-to-right: Standard horizontal control points
  • Vertical edges: Control points along the vertical axis
  • Backward edges: Curves that loop appropriately

For obstacle avoidance, use SmartBezierRouter which extends this behavior to route around intermediate nodes.
